timeline.message:
Fix updating password hash without replacing the entry (#333)
(cherry picked from commit a09fcc4)

timeline.bodyText: Add an empty line for consistency and readability. What is the reason the extension is not .md?
timeline.author: vrozov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,9 @@
-## 2020-03-05, Version 1.4.0.1 (Current)
+## 2020-03-31, Version 1.4.0.2 (Current)
+- Fixed bug which caused user to lose roles on account password update

replies.bodyText:
I don't know why it is not .md
Maybe fix it separately?
replies.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText: I was curious to understand the reason, no need to change it on the branch.
replies.author: vrozov

timeline.bodyText: Consider ${project.version}. Is tag used by the build?
timeline.author: vrozov

replies.bodyText:
Looks like scm:tag is not correctly used.  Looking up online it seems to be using HEAD as common value.
Maybe when the security repos were separate, this was used to push to local mvn repository and used for building there.
Maybe investigate this and put the correct value separately as ${project.version} may not be correct as well
replies.author: sujithvm
